    Qilei Zhang

    Ph.D. Candidate in Industrial Management at Purdue University. Interested in data science, machine learning, transportation and aviation.

    • West Lafayette, IN
    • zhan3599@purdue.edu
    • LinkedIn
    • Google Scholar
    • GitHub
    • Instagram

    Welcome! I'm a driven and passionate PhD Candidate and a research assistant in the School of Aviation and Transportation Technology at Purdue University, specializing in the intersection of data science and aviation. I have a background in Transportation Engineering from the University of California, Berkeley where I earned my master's degree in 2020.

    I invite you to explore my website and learn more about my academic pursuits, practical experiences, and research interests. Find detailed information about my ongoing and completed projects on the Projects page, get a glimpse of my professional life on the Work Experience page, and check out my published academic papers on the Publications page.
